name: Authentic Maasai Cultural Village
description: Experience traditional Maasai culture in an authentic village setting. Learn about ancient customs, participate in traditional dances, and witness the daily life of the Maasai people. Our knowledgeable guides will share stories passed down through generations about pastoralism, beadwork, and warrior traditions.
shortDescription: Immerse yourself in authentic Maasai culture and traditions

name: Karen Blixen Coffee Farm & Museum
description: Step into the world of the famous author of 'Out of Africa' at this beautifully preserved colonial estate. Tour the historic farmhouse, learn about coffee cultivation in Kenya, and explore the museum showcasing artifacts from the colonial era. The property offers stunning views of the Ngong Hills and provides insight into Kenya's colonial history.
shortDescription: Historic coffee farm and museum of the 'Out of Africa' author

name: Masai Mara National Reserve
description: Experience the world's most spectacular wildlife migration and encounter the Big Five in their natural habitat. The Masai Mara offers an authentic African safari experience with vast savannas, abundant wildlife, and the famous Great Migration from July to October.
shortDescription: Witness the Great Migration and experience Kenya's most famous safari destination.

name: Diani Beach
description: Relax on pristine white sand beaches with crystal clear waters along Kenya's coast. Diani Beach offers perfect conditions for swimming, snorkeling, and water sports, with coral reefs just offshore and a vibrant beachfront community.
shortDescription: Relax on pristine white sand beaches with crystal clear waters along Kenya's coast.

name: Amboseli National Park
description: Get up close with elephant herds against the backdrop of Mount Kilimanjaro. Amboseli is famous for its large elephant population and stunning views of Africa's highest mountain.
shortDescription: Get up close with elephant herds against the backdrop of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Lamu Island
description: Step back in time in this UNESCO World Heritage site with Swahili architecture and rich cultural heritage.
shortDescription: UNESCO World Heritage site with authentic Swahili culture and architecture.

name: Mount Kenya National Park
description: Challenge yourself with hiking and climbing on Africa's second-highest mountain.
shortDescription: Africa's second-highest mountain offering hiking and climbing adventures.

name: Tsavo East National Park
description: Explore one of Kenya's largest parks known for red elephants and diverse wildlife.
shortDescription: Kenya's largest park famous for red elephants and diverse wildlife.

name: Nairobi National Park
description: Experience wildlife safari just minutes from Kenya's capital city.
shortDescription: Unique wildlife experience just minutes from Nairobi city center.

name: Lake Nakuru National Park
description: Witness millions of flamingos and diverse birdlife in this alkaline lake ecosystem.
shortDescription: Famous for flamingo populations and diverse birdlife around alkaline lake.
